column1: Little Goat Diner////I was really excited to come here
column2: but unfortunately did not have a great experience. It was not the food
column4: but the safety of the restaurant. We found a small chard of glass in our ice tea. It might have came from the stacked glasses they used to serve water and iced tea. This issue was brought up to the manager
column6: but brushed it off as if it was a common
column7: non-serious complaint. There was no apology and no promise to fix the issue. Will not be returning.
